Posts.Content: Leeangel2016 wrote: My daughter has these huge tumors in her left breast she is supposed to see the surgeon on monday she is scared as am i what can we expect during this visit and is there any questions that i should ask that are vital for someone her age. We already know they will want to remove the tumors since they r deforming her breast already because of their size does anyone know any other girls this age having this done who could possibly give her support or answer some of her questions if they have already had the surgery Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 13 year old daughter with supposed benign tumors each over 6cm's Leeangel2016 SPECTER55
